snippet: Parishioners argued that Bishop Robert W. Finn should be subject to disciplinary action by the church for failing to notify authorities that a priest in his diocese was an active pedophile.
abstract: Group of Roman Catholics in Kansas City, Mo, and Rev James E Connell, priest with expertise in canon law, petitions Pope Francis to take disciplinary action against Bishop Robert W Finn, who was convicted in 2012 of failing to report a priest who was an active pedophile; argues Finn also broke church law and should be subject to a penal proceeding.
lead_paragraph: Parishioners argued that Bishop Robert W. Finn should be subject to disciplinary action by the church for failing to notify authorities that a priest in his diocese was an active pedophile.

headline.main: Pope Pressed on Bishop Who Supervised Pedophile
headline.print_headline: Pope Pressed on Bishop Who Supervised Pedophile
